name: Kimisha
description: Wanted to get my hair colored and called for salon at home service as getting hair color at a parlor is very boring and time taking. The service was excellent and my hair look awesome now.

name: Sanskriti Khanna
description: I have been a regular client of Lookplex since the first time I availed their services almost 6 months ago. The professionals are very efficient at everything. From using authentic products to grooming equipments they give you a Salon Like experience in the comfort of your home and at a very reasonable price.
